c1.name: The Leisurely "Meztli"...
c1.descriptionRaw:
The DMG dealt by the first Sharky's Surging Bite after Mualani enters Nightsoul's Blessing and the Shark Missiles it triggers is increased by 66% of Mualani's Max HP. This instance of increased DMG is subject to the diminishing DMG rules of <color=#FFD780FF>Surfshark Wavebreaker</color>.
In addition, while out of combat, Mualani's Nightsoul's Blessing state consumes 30% less Phlogiston and Nightsoul points.
c1.description:
The DMG dealt by the first Sharky's Surging Bite after Mualani enters Nightsoul's Blessing and the Shark Missiles it triggers is increased by 66% of Mualani's Max HP. This instance of increased DMG is subject to the diminishing DMG rules of Surfshark Wavebreaker.
In addition, while out of combat, Mualani's Nightsoul's Blessing state consumes 30% less Phlogiston and Nightsoul points.

c2.name: Mualani, Going All Out!
c2.descriptionRaw:
Mualani gains 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Surfshark Wavebreaker</color>'s Wave Momentum stacks when she enters Nightsoul's Blessing state. She will gain 1 stack when obtaining a Puffer.
In addition, whenever Mualani obtains 2 Puffers within a single instance of the Nightsoul's Blessing state, she will recover an additional 12 Nightsoul points over 2s. This effect requires the Passive Talent "Heat-Resistant Freshwater Floater" to be unlocked first.
c2.description:
Mualani gains 2 of Surfshark Wavebreaker's Wave Momentum stacks when she enters Nightsoul's Blessing state. She will gain 1 stack when obtaining a Puffer.
In addition, whenever Mualani obtains 2 Puffers within a single instance of the Nightsoul's Blessing state, she will recover an additional 12 Nightsoul points over 2s. This effect requires the Passive Talent "Heat-Resistant Freshwater Floater" to be unlocked first.

c3.name: Surfing Atop Joyous Seas
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Surfshark Wavebreaker</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Surfshark Wavebreaker by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Sharky Eats Puffies
c4.descriptionRaw:
Mualani regenerates 8 Energy when obtaining a Puffer. Must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heat-Resistant Freshwater Floater."
Additionally, <color=#FFD780FF>Boomsharka-laka</color> deals 75% increased DMG.
c4.description:
Mualani regenerates 8 Energy when obtaining a Puffer. Must first unlock the Passive Talent "Heat-Resistant Freshwater Floater."
Additionally, Boomsharka-laka deals 75% increased DMG.

c5.name: Same Style of Surfboard on Sale!
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Boomsharka-laka</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Boomsharka-laka by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Spirit of the Springs' People
c6.descriptionRaw: The DMG increase from the Constellation "The Leisurely 'Meztli'..." is no longer limited to being triggered once every Nightsoul's Blessing.
c6.description: The DMG increase from the Constellation "The Leisurely 'Meztli'..." is no longer limited to being triggered once every Nightsoul's Blessing.
